body:
Having trouble building package `openpmd-api` on all of the following x86_64 systems with `gcc@7.3.0` and `gcc@7.4.0`:
1. CentOS 7
2. CentOS 8
3. RHEL 7
4. RHEL 8
5. Ubuntu 18.04

Using develop at commit 471f23e456e3b26a (14-March-2020)

```
$> spack install openpmd-api
...
==> Error: Failed to install openpmd-api due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'
4 errors found in build log:
     137    /home/walker/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  -DopenPMD_EXPORTS -DopenPMD_USE_VERIFY=1 -I/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-openpmd-api-0.11.0-tzwey7v2bmofo4qriul4vybqefimrmpx/spack-src/include -I/tmp/walker/spack
```

title: openpmd-api fails to build
